pros: Awesome culture with people who care a lot about the mission of the place
cons: Laid back, people more interested in being nice than being effective. Best nice colleagues ever, but not the most effective or productive.

job_title: Senior Accounts Associate in Gurgaon, Haryana
pros:
Learning opportunities are available, 
Good Salary increment
cons:
Career growth is missing in this organization since it is very small. If you are looking for long term growth, this place is not good at all for you.

There is no job security. You have to become a perfect flatterer if you want to stay in this organization. 
I would suggest if you get a job in this organization, just work over there for six to seven months and then quit.
